BR_text.BRsummary: Unit TC Potential Bug / Ubuntu / IIO
BR_text.BRdescription:

comments_0.comment_text:
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2434>#2434</denchmark-link>
 . The person in charge will reply soon.
